112.content:
May clutched her sides for confort, but the pain started to grow stronger. She started to notice some changes to her eye color on the mirror when a jolt of pain came from her back, forcing her into all fours. Sweat started to drip from her brunette hair as she felt her clothes tighten around her petite frame. Suddenly, a ripping noise came from her blouse as it started to tear around the back.
May could feel all her muscles revoltously changing size, growing out of their normal proportions in a very fast pace. Again May heard the back of her blouse tearing and an excrusiating pain on her back as she felt something bulging and growing.
Another loud rip, and May's blouse fell in tatters to the ground. May noticed that her skin started to change its tone, from a pale white to a vivid dark green, and her back still pulsating in pain of the growth of a new appendage.
May felt her tight shorts tear themselves apart, unable to contain her growing legs and torso as they bulged with newly grown muscles.
Soon after, her throbbing shoes started to bother her too much, so she kicked them away in time to watch her socked feet bulge with new size, her entire bone structure crackling with the changes.
The unbeareble pain on May's back started to fade a little, only to be traded by another pain on the tips of her fingers and toes. In horror, May watched her gloves burst apart as her fingers grew out with newly formed claws in place of nails, and what remained of May's socks was shreded by growing claws on her toes.
This all happened too fast and as fast as the pain came, it started to fade away, leaving May stunned with a plethora of new sensations to explore.
May fainted for some minutes and when she woke up, her sight was all blurry and she had to blink to adjust her eyes to the light. With little effort, May got to her feet and immediately drew her attention to the mirror. "Where am I? Wow...all that I remember is that I was on a cruise on my way to meet Ash-OH MY GOD!"
May was overwhelmed by the sight at the mirror before her. In place of her usual self, May saw a very green face, tiny fangs came out of the sides of her mouth and her usual ocean blue eyes were now a shade of red. Her green bandanna remained wrapped around her head but her hair was a mess.
May looked around her body, newly changed it was still strange to her. She was definitely taller and her slim teenage frame was now a very curvy and athletic build. She felt an itch on her back and as she made motion to scratch it a new part of her body made itself evident to her. a little below her shoulder length, there was a green bulb with leaves at its sides. May immediately identified this feature as the one from a bulbasaur, but a little bigger to match the size of her back.
As May took a step, she immediately felt that the soles of her feet were a little more sensitive. "Oh my, what should I do? If that pain from earlier made me become a bulbasaur-girl what has it done to the others in the cruise?"
May, seeing that she had only an overstretched bra and pantyes on, started looking around the room for something to cover herself. She was actually thinking about leaving her cabin and see what had gone outside. Still, she started to think about what manner of fate awaited her if she left the cabin.

1121.content:
May wraps herself with some blankets and grabs her backpack, "you never know what could be out there". Then, May slowly grabs the doorknob and opens the door. She could hear some noises from outside already.
When she opens the door, May is greated by the sound of hundreds of people screaming and comotion in every deck of the ship. As she makes her way into the ship's corridor, the entire ship starts to shake and May hears someone far into the upper decks screaming "the ship is out of control! We are all doomed!"
Desperate, May runs to the upper deck and is greated with a sight she thought only possible on a grotesque dream. Hundreds of the ship's crew and the passagers where all transformed into some hybrid between a human and a pokemon!
People crying, thinking and even desperate for this terrible dream to end, all there at the main deck while the ship itself seemed to be out of control, maybe the captain and his crew where unable to keep the journey.
May had to figure out a way to get out of this ship. She looked around and everywhere she looked she saw more and more people, now turned hybrids, having a variety of reactions from the changes.
Then, May noticed that the ship was close to a port, but at this rate the ship would pass by and keep going into the ocean. If she was to get to civilization any time soon it would have to be now, she could jump the cruise ship and swim to the shores, but May was afraid of what people would think of her in this form, she didn't know if this transformation insident was isolated or more people would know about it, and she was afraid of being captured and taking part some kind of bizarre test.

The turtle pokemon appears confused with his trainer's new appearence but then May grabs him and yells "please take me to the shore!", then she jumps off the ship.

112111.content:
"Hey girl, have you seen a cruise ship- O MY, MAY IS THAT YOU?"
May heard the voice from a distance, when she turned to see who it belonged to she saw Ash, running towards her. She blushed a little, because she didn't really know how she would present herself to him in that state.
As Ash got near, May tried to cover herself as much as she could with what she had, but she didn't bring enough blankets to cover her entire self, always leaving her face or her legs in view.
Ash got close to her and raised a hand in means to give May a conforting grip. "Hey, May its you isn't it? I would recognize that bandanna anywhere...what's wrong? Why are you covering yourself that much?"
May juls let the blanket covering her face slip a little and showed Ash what was wrong with her. "Oh Ash it was horrible! Out of nowhere this epidemic struck the cruise and people started becoming pokemon hybrids all over!"
Ash, now warmly holding May's shoulder, tried to sort this situation. "So, you don't know what turned you into a pokemon Hybrid?"
"Yes, and..." she started to shake Ash's hand away and started to back away from him "...and it might be contagious! I don't want you to catch it and become a freak like I did!"
Ash looked May in the eyes and said "come on May, it's not like you are some sort of monster, you are still you...even if you are a hybrid from outside, and this is what matters most now!"
May took a deep breath, yeah he is right, May thought, even if I changed I am still myself...mostly. Then, May let her sea soaked blankets fall as she closed in on Ash and gave him a very warm and friendly hug, with tears falling from her eyes. "Oh Ash it was horrible! I felt so much pain! I'm so glad I could meet you!"
"It's all right now May, calm down, don't worry we have been through worse..." As they hugged, May felt more confortable and calmed down. After some minutes hugging, they started walking back to Sandgem Town.
"So Ash, wasn't Brock with you? And what about that new friend of yours, Dawn?" May asked. Ash turned his face to answer her "Well, Dawn wasn't feeling very well so Brock stayed behind at the Pokemon Center to help her get better...strange though, everyone in town seems to be busy taking care of sick relatives..."
"Oh my god Ash! This is exactly what was happening at the cruise!" May's desperation started to show all over again.
"Lets get to the pokemon center then, and hope Nurse Joy has some way of curing this!". With this, Ash and May start heading to the Pokemon Center.

Ash Gasped as he saw Dawn's new figure. She still had her white hat covering her dark blue hair, which flowed down her back, but now she had huge bunny ears that rested bent at the sides of her head, coming out of her head all the way down past her shoulder line.
Her entire body was now covered with a soft layer of brown fur, that got lighter at some places, and her entire figure was noe looking quite older and developped. Dawn had longer legs, that ended in enormous bunny feet, which still had a human feel to them but were more a mix between Dawn's petite feet and those of a Lopunny.
Dawn's new fur coat made her look fluffyer but a very well defined muscle outling could be seen all over her body, in fact, Dawn's muscles were small but very well defined and not even her fur could hide that, and to complete the scene, Dawn was wearing her usual pink skirt that could barelly reach her knees and her blouse looked definitely tighter, even with her scarf around her neck and covering some of her upper bust. "Wow Dawn you look amazing!" said Ash.
"Yeah, I feel very good as well! Way better then I felt earlier! In fact, I changed just some minutes ago." Dawn said on her always cheerful tone. "Guess now all we need is for Brock to change as well!"
"I don't think I will Dawn, I don't feel any of the symptoms everyone else was feeling this mourning" Brock said, with a little bit of disappointment on his tone.
"Well Dawn, this changes always made me forget! This is May, my friend from Hoenn and one of the best pokemon coordinators I've ever known!" said Ash gesturing towards May.
The bulbasaur-girl's green cheeks blushed a little at this flattery, as she scratched the back of her head "well I'm not that good...in fact Ash taught me most that I know about pokemon...well...nice to meet you Dawn!" With that, May and Dawn shook hands and shared a brief friendly hug.
"Hey did you all notice the Pokemon Center seems a little calmer now?" Said an inquisitive Brock.
"Well, now that you mention it, there was quite a noise outside but it all seems to have stopped all of a sudden" said May.
"We better check it out, might have something to do with all this transformation fuss" said Ash, opening the door to the room.
Indeed, the once crowded corridors of the Center now were very empty and there was no sign of conflict or anything. Everyone then followed Ash into the corridor and back into the Pokemon Center's main hall. In the main hall though, they had quite a different sight.
Every single pokemon hybrid that seemed to be around before was now seated in every corner of the room, watching wide-eyed at an announcement on the TV. A news reporter saying "Well this video footage came in today from a source that claims to be responsible for the recent insident of people transforming into pokemon htbrids" With that, the screen goes black for a momment and then the footage in question starts to be streamed.
A figure in a white mask with red details stood right before the camera. For a minute the figure stood silent, but then he started talking with a very deep and rasped voice, "People throughout the world! This is the hour of change! Wat happened at Sinnoh is just the beginning! We, the Evanescent will bring uppon the world a new era! An era of peace, ruled by one and only being of true power! The humanity shall cast away their old beliefs and join the cause of the new people, the people made perfect, both human and pokemon alike can share the gift we offer! We are the future, we are the Evanescent! For peace and prosperity!"
The screen then turned black once again, and the face of the news reporter made itself shown on screen once more, but this time speechless, like everyone else at the Pokemon Center. Ash and friends made their silent way back into their room.
Back at the room, everyone seemed concerned about this new group Evanescent that came out of nowhere and claimed to have changed almost every human and even pokemon at Sinnoh in hybrids. It was quite sudden and not one of them knew what they should do right now.

1121111121221111.content:
Being Sandgem Town so small, if anything was going wrong everyone would know as soon as it happened, however, the movement around town was pretty strange after the transformation catastrophe. The streets were empty and everyone was appearently traveling or at home coping with the consequences of the transformations.
Brock gave the idea to ask for clues of this new team in the police department, one of the policemen was bound to know something about all this.
Not far from Sandgem there was a small police outpost with a few guards that were only there to ensure safety on the route to Jubilife city. There, our heroes had set as their first destination.
When they arrived however, something seemed strange. Abandoned motorcycles near the small police house showed that someone might still be in there, but the building itself was unlocked and seemed very abandonned from the outside.
Inside though, our heroes spotted what could only be described as utter destruction. The furniture was in pretty bad shape and the place was very dirty and suspiciously calm, as if a hurricane thrashed the place and left no trace behind.
It was then that Dawn's super sensitive bunny ears caught a noise coming from one of the back rooms. "Hey guys, did you hear that?"
"Hear what Dawn?" Brock answered.
"It's like a faint noise, like someone is beating onto a door or something." Dawn answered still concentrating on the noise.
"Can you tell us where it is coming from?" Ash asked.
"From that door at the back" Dawn said poiting to a door right beside a broken reception counter. The door was wide open so everyone could see a corridor leading to a few back rooms, maybe some cells for keeping criminals until they could be transfered to the larger prisons.
Being the largest, Ash took the lead and went in first to investigate the noise. As silently as he could with his new size, Ash made it to the back corridor of the building and soon started hearing the noise as well. Dawn, May and Brock followed closely behind until all of them could hear the noises as well.
It sounded like someone beating on a wooden chair or table and it apparently came from behind a closed door. Ash checked to see if the door was locked and ended breaking the doorknob due to his new charizard strength, and with a little pull the door was open and they could see what was inside.
The room loked like a restroom, with a hard looking couch and some wooden chairs. What called Ash's attention though was a policeman, tied from hear to toe and with his mouth gagged, beating at a fallen table ad the floor in means to call for attention.
In sight of the charizard-man on the door though, the man panicked and struggled to moove away from Ash. Ash made his way into the room, making room for the others to go in and see what he saw first.
"Sir, calm down, we won't hurt you!" Ash said, making motion to reach for the ropes that tied the man down. Surprisingly, the man seemed calmed by Ash's statement and stopped thrashing away from him. Ash, then, grabbed the ropes and started to cut them with his claws releasing the man's arms and legs. The policeman immediately pulled the durc tape that gagged his mouth and took a deep breath.
"Oh thank the gods for releasing me! I have been like this for an hour or so now!"
"Can you tell us what happened to this place officer?" Brock asked.
The officer took some time to catch his breath and then started in a very worryed tone "It was horrible! This mourning, Officer Jenny and Officer Trent, my friends and companions here at this police outpost, started transforming into pokemon!"
"Yes, it happened with us as well" stated May.
"Well that's not the problem though" the policeman resumed " they were fine at first, only a little unused to their new forms but mentally, they were fine. "Then contact Jubilife as soon as you can, we will need all the help we can get and this whole thing might turn up pretty badly."
"Hey Brock, what about Professor Rowan?" Dawn asked.
"Good point Dawn! Professor Rowan might know something more about this whole transformation thing!" Ash said.
"Dawn has a good point, and Rowan's lab is not far, we could go out of our way to Jubilife to check on the Profesor." Brock said.
"Is it set then? We are going to Professor Rowan's lab and then to Jubilife?" May asked and everione agreed.
The videophones in the police station were completely wrecked so the officer had to make his way to Jubilife by motorbike, and seen that he could only carry one person with him the group decided to let him go ahead to Jubilife and then meet him there after they had met Professor Rowan.
After some walking the group finally made it to the wooden doors of Professor Rowan's small lab. There, they knocked on the door and for some time they heard nothing, until Dawn's super sensitive ears started hearing Professor Rowan's voice calling for help from inside the lab.
Immediately the group whent in and saw what the concern was all about. A fierce looking Mightyena hybrid was frantically scratching at the wooden door that led to the back rooms, and from behind the door they could hear Professor Rowan's voice desperately calling for help.
Ash quickly took the lead of the team and tackled the Mightyena hybrid away from the door. May thought about immobilizing the hybrid and unconsiously, vines erupted from the plant bulb on her back and wrapped around the hybrid's wrists and ankles.
The creature was shaking violently so Pikachu jumped off of Ash's shoulder and thundershocked the hybrid until it was unconsious. May kept it tightly wrapped though just to be safe.
Seeing that Brock was the only human, well the only unchanged human, of the group. They all agreed that Brock was to open the door and check on the professor.
Not surprisingly though, the door was locked so Brock gave it a light knock and said "Professor we are here, we have incapacitated the Mightyena hybrid, it is safe to come out!"
After the audible sound of something very large rasping on the ground as it was being pushed away, the door openned and Professor Rowan stepped out. Rowan was his usual self though, old with grayed hair and even his usual lab coat.
"Thank you for saving me..." the professor paused for a moment to take a good look at every one of his saviors, then he got closer to Dawn and asked "hmm... aren't you the little Dawn? That cheerful girl that took Piplup as her starter?"
"Yep, that is me!" Dawn answered smiling.

"So, Professor, would you mind telling us what happened here?" May asked while tightening the curls of her vines over the unconsious hybrid.
"Well, this hybrid used to be my assistant. He transformed this mourning and was feeling quite all right until shortly after he ate some pokefood from a shipment that arrived just yesterday. Then he lost his mind and started acting like a beast so I hid in the back rooms"
"Well professor, we were expecting that you could shed some more light into this whole transformation that happened today." Brock asked.
"Actually I can. Before my assistant went berserk I managed to run some tests and found out that he has been infected with some kind of virus that slowly changed him."
"Slowly like how long Professor?" Ash asked.
"Well, my tests could hardly be conclusive but for what I know, this change has been on the making for aproximately a month, but it had a very evident final stage that was triggered by something, my guess is that the water supply has whatever it is that triggers the transformation."
"Wow, so you are saying we have been infected for so long and that we transformed because we drank water?" Dawn asked.
"Basically, yes. However, I am more concerned with what my assistant is suffering right now. He was mentally healthy this mourning and after eating this new pokefood he went mad."
"Hm, so the pokefood makes hybrids mad, what do you plan to do Professor?" Brock asked.
"Little lady" Rowan pointed at May who was still holding the Mightyena hibrid tightly with her vines "if you would be so kind as to get my assistant to one of the back rooms, I would like to run a few more tests."
"Sure! Oh and name is May by the way!"
"Of course, how rude of me. Sorry May but those events left me a little shaken"
"It's fine, tis guy is kinda heavy, Ash would you mind giving me a hand?" May said as she tried in vain to lift the fallen hybrid with her vines.
"Oh sure May, let me hold him!" Ash grabbed the hybrid's limp body and lifted it with ease, being careful,not to damege May's vines though.

114.content:
Her headache seemed to worsen, distracting her from the fact her ears began to stretch into triangles, becoming pink with tufts at the ends. Her hair and skin followed, with her hair and head becoming the same, soft pink colored fur while the front of her face became covered in cream colored crescent shape that surrounded her eyes and mouth.

She squinted her eyes in an attempt to stifle the pain, finding herself unable to open them fully when it passed, leaving her with large, slit-like eyes similar to the kitten Pokemon. Under her clothes, she could feel the fur pink and cream colored fur spread, covering her shoulders and back with pink fur and her arms, legs and the front of her body with cream fur. Her hands and feet became stubby and softer, being reduced to three fingers and toes on each. She flexed them curiously, realizing they still function like human limbs despite having an appearance akin to paws.

The sudden warmness would soon be forgotten when May felt a strange, confining pressure build up within her shorts. The pressure increased, disabling her from reaching the back of her shorts and forcing her to lean against the bed. With a struggling push, she felt the pressure release and heard a loud tearing sound with it. Looking behind her, she could see the end of her newly grown, puffy pink tail with what appeared to be three pin protruding from the ends.

Before she could react to her sudden change into a Skitty-girl, May spotted her tail involuntarily twitch, sparking a new, playful side in her mind. Forgetting her panic, she began wagging her behind back and forth eagerly like a cat before pouncing at it in a chase, leaving her running around in circles, trying to grab at her tail playfully.

It was not long before the newly transformed May tired herself out, dropping onto her side on the bed in a dizzy state.

May caught her breath after a moment, getting off the bed and towards the door with her newly grown tail in tow. It was a little shocking to her to realize she was able to turn the door knob with ease as if she had always had them, but brushed the feeling off, rather wondering if any of the other passengers were affected.

Sure enough, all the other passengers present had become human Pokémon hybrids. What was strange though was that none of them looked panicked or even aware of their changes! May walked outside to see various types of morphs going about their cruise line activities. Sunflora and other grass-type Pokémon were photosynthesizing in the sun, with even an Espeon-girl happily curled up on a lounge chair. A Magmar hybrid was flaming kebobs at the open grill while a Lickitung-boy and a Snorlax-girl fought over the last tropical flavored Poffin, unaware of the floating Combee-girl happily replacing the empty tray with another batch. In the pool, there were a group of Squirtle and Wartortle-girls playing pool volleyball without a worry.

This was only a fraction of all the changed passengers May saw on board. She still had no idea how far the changes have gone in different regions. What also troubled the Skitty-girl was that there was clear evidence that they all had changed, like the obviously fresh tear in the back of a Squirtle-girl's one-piece that her tail made. May herself was even questioning whether this was normal or not!

"I've got to find out if Ash and the others are okay, Skitty!" she told herself before quickly slapping her hands over her mouth. The changes were affecting her behavior as well! 'Considering I was chasing my tail just moments ago'

She had left her Pokémon to take care of things at home, unfortunately leaving her to travel to Sandgem Town under these strange circumstances on her own.

11432.content:
Though she knew it would be risky, May needed to know if the other passengers were affected or if she was the only one. Her tail now swinging back and forth anxiously (and subconsciously with anticipation), she decided to peek out of her cabin door.

Cautiously looking down one side of the hallway, she saw the floor she was on was nearly deserted, easing her a bit knowing that she has a better chance of sneaking around without being seen.

Unfortunately, those hopes were immediately set aside when she looked down the other side, looking just in time to spot a familiar pink tail end slipping around the corner. May's heart skipped at the sight, fearing the weirdness of the situation was about to skyrocket.

May followed after the tail, her plans of stealth immediately dropped as she already had a sinking feeling as to what she was about to find. She rounded the corner, only to watch the tail turn another up the stairs.

'Please, please, please, PLEASE! Let it not be what I think it is!' she frantically thought to herself as she reached the base of the stairs. She stood there for a moment, hesitating whether or not she really wanted to confirm her theory or not. She breathed in deep, bracing herself as she stepped out into the sunlit deck.

What May saw caused her tail to shoot up straight through her shorts: everyone on the cruise ship was either an anthro Skitty like herself or still in the process of changing. Skitty people were playing with the Poké beach balls that now bounced around the deck like felines while also playing around with each other, mainly with each other's tails. Others were curled up or stretched out on the lounge chairs as well as the warmed wooden floors. She even witnessed Skitty people purring on and grooming still changing humans, inadvertently accelerating the transformation.

But what shocked May the most was the fact that everyone seemed to be completely oblivious to their changes, their minds quickly settling into their bodies with matching mental changes.

Of course, what the Skitty-girl could not have ever completely known was that she was the patient zero to the Neo Pokérus, and that first contact had mutated the virus into a template anyone else who now came in contact with the virus as well as "improvements" to ensure optimal mental faculties for their new bodies.

May couldn't help but feel happy and energetic to see more of her kind...
"No, NO! I can't let myself fall for this!" she said to herself, despite her Skitty tail wagging happily. "I have to find out how to fix this!"

But what could she do now?

12531.content:
"Uh... Red? You alright?" The young man asks nervously after almost a minute passes and Misty does not resurface. "Uh, d-does this mean that you forfeit? Because if you did, that means that I win, right-"

With a blood-curdling roar that sends the challenger down to his knees, clutching his ears in pain, the water explodes, and an utterly massive form bursts from the pool, landing heavily back on the platform on all fours. The creature looks like Misty - it has her eyes, it's about the same color as her hair, and the guy can see that it's wearing the shredded remains of her clothing, but the similarities end there.

First of all, she's grown taller - even hunched over on all fours she stands at least two feet taller than her challenger. She's also quite a bit brawnier, with toned muscles that wouldn't look out of place on a weight lifter, yet at the same time as lean and trim as a swimmer's frame now packed onto her form. Her muscular legs are bent and twisted, digitigrade almost like the hind legs of an Arcanine or Mightyena, with three clawed toes connected with webbed skin on each foot; meanwhile, her arms are considerably longer than they were before, with three fingers and a thumb on each hand, the digits connected with webbing just like on her feet and tipped with razor-sharp curved talons. A long Gyarados tail lashes through the air behind the transformed Gym Leader, occasionally slapping at the water, and her head now sports a mouthful of razor-sharp fangs, long orangey-red hair flowing down her shoulders, fins in the place of ears, and the trademark three-point head crest of the Atrocious Pokemon, setting her eyes in a permanent glare. Her back and flanks are covered in orangey-red scales as bright and blazing as a roaring campfire; also running down her back are several jagged plates like the ones found on the back of a Gyarados, with the largest pair growing from between her shoulder blades and the smallest on the small of her back. Her underside, on the other hand, is covered in tough hide about the same color as her skin from before her transformation.
And speaking of her underside...
The challenger's face turns beet red as he stares at Misty's new and improved figure. Her previously flat chest has expanded immensely, with each breast now easily a bit bigger than her head, and is counterbalanced by a toned stomach, wide hips, and a sizable ass. The young man can't help but drool a little bit at the sight of the almost totally nude Gym Leader's figure.

His lust, however, is quickly replaced by fear once again as the Misty-monster roars again.
"What's the matter, kid?" She snarls, revealing row after row of fangs in a feral grin and causing the trainer's face to go pale at the sight. She holds out Starmie's Pokeball in one webbed hand and recalls it, cracking her own knuckles. "Thought that you were tough." She spreads her arms out. "C'mon; hit me with your best shot."

The insult finally snaps the Lillycove challenger back to reality. "Y-you bitch!" He shouts. "Absol, use Night Slash! That freak's a Pokemon now, it can take damage!"
The Absol nods and leaps towards the transformed Gym Leader, bounding across the floating platforms with the skill of a mountain goat, its front glows sheathing themselves in blackish-purple energy as it pounces towards the much larger hybrid with a snarl, ready to strike...

Only to be hit in the face with an Aqua Tail and smacked across the battlefield, where it bounces off the water's surface like a skipping stone before finally skidding to a stop at its trainer's feet, barely managing to push itself back up.
"My turn." Misty growls, her maw already glowing with burning orange light as she prepares to charge up another attack. Arceus above, this was amazing! The transformation process had hurt like hell, but now... now she was strong, strong, strong! Nobody could challenge her, nobody could stand up to her might!
"Absol, get up and use Protect!" The trainer screams as the Disaster Pokemon struggles back up to its feet. "We'll beat her if it's the last thing we-"

Misty used Hyper Beam.

The blast of energy slams into both the Absol and its trainer, sending them flying through the air once again and blasting them through the wall of the gym like it was cardboard. Both human and Pokemon scream loudly as they are flung through the air, rapidly shrinking into a speck on the horizon.
Misty snorts with satisfaction at the sight. "Showed that punk." She growls, noticing for the first time just how gravelly her voice has become. Eh, whatever - the tradeoff was so worth it.
"Let's see my sisters try and one-up me now." She chuckles to herself, hefting her titanic breasts in her webbed hands and giving them a gentle shake. "I can be my own Pokemon team now!"

Misty brought her injured Pokemon back to the tanks where they normally lived and headed for the door of the gym, ignoring the screams of terror as people fled from the monstrous sight and/or covered their children's eyes. The transformed Gym Leader smirked as she noticed more than a few men and women staring open-mouthed at her new figure - she was an absolute knockout now, no doubt about that. But never mind that - she needed to get out of the city for a while. Misty felt like she was going to explode with all this newfound power - she needed to swim free, to get in a good fight, to do something! Maybe she should head towards the Lake of Rage or the ocean - somewhere with a lot of strong Pokemon she could have a good spar with. Heck, maybe she should track down Ash, see how well she stacked up against that Pikachu of his. The redhead chuckled to herself as she imagined Ash's shocked face at her new body, then let out a soft moan as the memory of her friend spurred a familiar warmth in between her legs. Yesss, maybe she should track Ash down - it had been a long time since she and him had last seen one another, and Misty was eager to... reacquaint herself with him.

So, where does Misty head out to?

125312.content:
Yes, she'd visit Ash first, Misty decided. She knew from first-hand experience just how strong his Pokemon were, but beyond that, the warmth in between her legs that had started up when she first thought of him had grown into a raging inferno. She had to have him, and she had to have him now! Luckily, Ash was in Kanto at the moment - when he'd heard about the spread of the strange flu, he had returned home to Pallet Town to spend some time with his Pokemon and lay low until the disease had run its course through the world. After all, a pandemic meant that there weren't any Gym Badges to obtain. Lucky for him - if Misty had had to walk across an entire region to get to her lover, she was pretty sure that he'd end up with a shattered pelvis as a result of her pent-up lust.

But enough about what-ifs; right now, she had a trainer to seduce! Walking all the way to Pallet Town would take too long - not when she had a far swifter option at hand.

Misty stalked towards the Cerulean City waterfront and leapt off one of the docks into the water, rocketing down the river with the help of her webbed hands and feet and long lashing tail. Smaller Water-type Pokemon scattered as they saw her coming, and a flock of Farfetch'd took off squawking and flapping as they were tossed about like toys in her wake. The transformed Gym Leader paid the fleeing Pokemon no heed; she had a mission, and damned if she didn't see it through to the end.

Swimming all the way from Cerulean City to Pallet Town went a lot faster than Misty expected it to - only about an hour and a half as opposed to the day-long trip she was expecting it to be. Regardless, she was here now, bursting up from the waves as they crashed against the beach. The Gyarados hybrid shook herself dry for a few seconds to dislodge most of the water, then looked towards the town proper. Now, where to look for Ash? Knowing him, he'd be either at Professor Oak's lab, talking to Tracey and the Pokemon Professor himself and reconnecting with his Pokemon, or he'd be at his house, eating some of his mother's delicious home cooking. The two locations were equally likely to have the raven-haired Trainer present, but which one should she search?

The water bubbled and broiled, and a rounded reptilian head with a sharp horn growing from in between the eyes rose from the water, a head of red hair cascading downwards to about a quarter of the way down the long, serpentine neck that it was connected to. The trainer's mouth hung open, and he took a few steps backwards in shock as the newly transformed Misty broke the surface of the pool and she clambered back up onto the platform, water still dripping from her titanic form.

She was enormous now, standing at a towering ten feet tall, causing her clothing to tear away like wet tissue paper and leaving her totally naked. She was covered in light blue scales on her back and cream-tan down her front, a dark grey shell studded with short blunt-tipped projections covered her broad back... and her figure had gone from tomboyish to fertility goddess. Her formerly petite A-cup breasts now defied the alphabet system of classification; each one was easily nearly twice the size of a beach ball and sported a nipple the size of a grown man's fist, and nearly totally covered her stomach underneath their smooth, heaving bulk; said stomach now carried a considerable amount of paunch to its broad waist - blubber to protect against colder weather. Her ass was more than a little bit smaller than her immense new breasts, but they were by no means small - her rear end, which sported a short stubby tail above it, looked like a pair of prize-winning pumpkins had been stuffed underneath her skin, and were connected to a set of thighs thicker around than a man's torso that in turn transitioned to long, smooth, thick legs ending in three-toed feet. Similarly, Misty's arms were thick both with pudge and a fair amount of muscle, and each hand now sported two fingers and a thumb, with slight webbing growing in between her fingers.

Misty now looked like a goddess of the ocean that stepped out from the pages of myth and legend and into real life... and she did not look happy at the impudent trainer that had entered her domain.
"Starmie, return." The transformed Gym Leader declared, recalling the many-legged Water-type back into its Pokeball. "I'll handle this from here." Misty didn't know how the hell this had happened to her, but she certainly wasn't going to complain about it - she felt strong, stronger than she had ever felt before, and she was eager to put it to the test.
"Wh-what the-...?" The trainer stammered out, barely able to believe what was standing before him. "Oh, fuck it! Absol, use Night Slash on that freak! If she wants to fight against us, let's show her what we've got!"
"Sol!" The Disaster Pokemon barked out, sprinting towards the immense Lapras girl and its horn glowing with Dark-type energy as it prepared to attack...

Only to get hit dead-on with a Confuse Ray and stagger to a stop, flopping down on its face and passing out.

Misty grinned fiendishly at the stunned trainer, then eased herself into the water, swimming across the pool separating herself from the petrified young man. "Now..." She murmured, "What should I do with you?"

Cynthia was relaxing on the beach in Undella Town, enjoying the sun and the warmth of the summer. As champion of Sinnoh, she had heard plenty of rumors about this strange new flu that was making the rounds throughout the regions - apparently, victims were subject to strange behavioral changes, almost like various types of Pokemon. Until, that is, a strange sort of squirming feeling began to start up inside of her.
"What on Earth...?" Cynthia murmured, looking down at herself; immediately after that, however, she let out a scream and fell off of her beach chair onto the sand, writhing around in pain as fiery agony blossomed through her entire body like if some mad designer was rearranging her innards, warping and twisting her body into a strange new form. Nobody really came to the section of the beach that she was currently at, so nobody was around to witness the sight of Cynthia, champion of Sinnoh, transforming into a hybrid of human and....

1453221.content:
Clair stared in shock as her powerful Dragonite was tossed around the arena by the Wigglytuff of her challenger, a smug-looking young man with reddish-brown hair. "This... this is impossible!" She shouted, a vein popping up on her forehead. She was the strongest Dragon-type trainer in the world, dammit! How was she losing to some upstart punk with a Wigglytuff, of all things?!

The trainer just shrugged and shot her an arrogant smirk. "Oh, it's happening alright, lady!" He bragged. "You're out of date! But say, after I finish stomping you, how about a lunch date with me?"

The Dragon-type Gym Leader snarled in fury. "Why, you little punk!" She roared. "Why, I oughtta-GAAAAAH!"

Suddenly, Clair collapsed to the ground and began to twitch and convulse, causing both battling Pokemon to pause and look towards the woman. Even the trainer wore a look of concern at the sight.

"Um, ma'am? You... you alive?" He hesitantly asked, taking a step forwards... and freezing in his tracks as Clair's body shone with light, much like a Pokemon about to evolve. Her silhouette began to shift and contort, and as the light faded away, it was revealed that she had transformed into...

1453221212.content: Perhaps a Kingdra, Clair's signature Pokémon?
1453221212.title: Other

14532212121.content:
Clair collapsed onto her hands and knees as her legs gave way. Her legs began to fuse together as blue scales formed over her entire body. Once her legs had finished fusing, Clair’s leg began to change shape, forming into a tail that curled in towards her belly. Yellow scales formed on her belly as a white fin burst out from her back. The fin had a blue spine at the top and at the base, and a pair of blue spines pushed out through her hair, one on either side of her head.

As the light faded from Clair’s body, it was clear that her legs had formed into a Kingdra’s tail, a Kingdra’s fin protruded from her back, and a Kingdra’s head spines were poking through her hair. Clair was breathing heavily, and her new scales were covered in the sweat that had covered her skin during the painful transformation. Clair’s Dragonite stood close to his trainer, a worried look on his face as he began to reach out to touch Clair, then thought better of it.

“What the heck?” whispered the trainer Clair had been battling once the light had faded. The young man ran a hair through his reddish-brown hair nervously and took a few cautious steps towards Clair.

“Uh, ma’am?” he asked. “Can... can you hear me? Are you alright?”

The trainer’s words were barely able to pierce the fog in Clair’s addled mind. She opened her eyes and looked up at the trainer, and the trainer gasped in shock when he saw that Clair’s eyes now had red irises, rather than the blue they had been before her transformation. As Clair looked at the trainer, she felt something rising within her...
14532212121.title: Kingdra.

145322121211.content:
As Clair looked up at the trainer opposite her, uncontrollable rage started to swell within her. This smug, arrogant jerk had the nerve to insult her gym and her Pokémon by attempting to simply stonewall her Pokémon with a Fairy type! And, to add insult to injury, he directly insulted her, then rubbed salt in the wound by asking her out on a date! Her anger overrode her conscience, and as her rage swelled within her, so did something else.

The trainer was frozen in shock as Clair’s face twisted with pure hatred, and with a roar, she opened her mouth and sent gallons of water flying straight at the trainer as Clair unleashed the full power of a Hydro Pump attack.

The trainer’s Wigglytuff leapt into the path of the oncoming Hydro Pump, and a blue shield formed around the Wigglytuff as she used Protect to shield herself and her trainer from the attack. Water streamed around the shield as the high pressure blast continued for several seconds, pushing the Wigglytuff back towards her trainer until she was practically in his arms. When the blast finally subsided, The trainer and his Wigglytuff were both damp from the water that had rained down on them over the shield, but they were both unharmed. The trainer looked up at Clair, and seeing her murderous expression, decided that it would probably best to cut his losses.

“C’mon, girl, let’s get out of here!” the trainer yelled as he held out a Moon Ball and recalled his Wigglytuff. Once his Wigglytuff was safely inside her Moon Ball, he turned and ran out of the gym as fast as he could.

Clair watched him leave, water dripping from her mouth as she panted from exertion. As the trainer fled her gym, Clair’s initial anger began to subside, and rational thought returned to her as she realised that she had just used a Pokemon move. Clair looked down at her arms, and for the first time noticed that her body was now covered in blue scales. She tried to stand up, and that was when she realised her legs had transformed into a Kingdra’s tail when she felt her new tail start to uncurl and push against the ground.

“Wha... what’s happened to me...?” Clair asked. She looked up at her Dragonite, who was standing back slightly, watching her with concern.

“Dragonite?” Clair asked. “Can you carry me? I don’t think I can walk.”

Clair’s Dragonite nodded, and scooped Clair up in his arms, and Clair felt the strange sensation of her Dragonite’s arms against the fin on her back. Clair wrapped her arms around her Dragonite’s neck as he extended his wings and took off, flying out of the Blackthorn City Gym.

Where does Clair’s Dragonite take her?
145322121211.title: Clair feels angry.

choices: Clair saw the trainer from before.
1453221212112.content:
After a brief flight over Blackthorn City, Clair’s Dragonite landed in front of the local Pokémon Center. Once her Dragonite was on solid ground, Clair relaxed her grip around his neck, and looked at the doors to the Pokemon Center. It was hard to tell from out here, but it seemed like there was a bit of a commotion inside the Pokemon Center.

“Is there something going on in there?” Clair asked, glancing up at her Dragonite. “I can’t quite tell.”

Her Dragonite simply shrugged his shoulders slightly and shook his head. It was clear he had no idea what was going on inside the Pokemon Center, either.

“Well, only one way to find out,” said Clair. Her Dragonite nodded, and walked up to the door. The door slid open as Dragonite approached, and once the two of them were inside...
1453221212112.title: The Pokémon Centre.

choices: Clair's Dragonite feels fine... for now.
14532212121122.content:
The Pokémon Center was in complete chaos as Clair’s Dragonite carried her inside, and it wasn’t hard to see why. The lobby was full of people who had been transformed into hybrids, much like she had.

Sitting on the floor to the left was a naked woman who had been transformed into a Dodrio hybrid. She now had three identical human-like heads, which were covered in brown feathers, and had two black feathers forming a V-shaped crest on each head. The mouths on all three of her heads had been stretched into beaks, and her necks had stretched out, to a similar length to that of a Dodrio’s. Her necks and legs were a light brown, the same colour as her beaks, and her body was covered in brown feathers, identical to the ones covering her heads. Black feathers covered her upper thighs and hips, and three large pink feathers poked out from her back, forming a tail. The three-headed Dodrio woman was sobbing from all three of her heads as a young man wearing the clothes of a Bird Keeper tried to comfort her. That was when Clair realised that the woman was not a human that had developed Dodrio traits, but was actually a female Dodrio that had been mutated with human traits.

Over on the right side of the Pokémon Center’s lobby, two people, a young man and a young woman, both wearing the remains of Ace Trainer uniforms, were yelling at each other. The young man had become a Seviper hybrid. His skin was now covered in black scales, except for the purple markings on the left side of his upper lip and face, and gold scales on his lower jaw and forehead. His eyes were red, the same colour as the two fangs extending from his mouth. A black tail had ripped through his pants, and was twitching irritably, waving the red-tipped blade around. The female Ace Trainer had become a Zangoose hybrid. Her body was now covered in white fur, her ears were now pointed, covered in fur and much longer, and a furry tail had burst through her pants. Red fur covered her left ear and both of her hands, which now consisted of a thumb and two fingers that ended in large black claws. The two Ace Trainer’s arguments got louder as the two acted on the instinctual hatred between Zangoose and Seviper, until the female Ace Trainer’s claws glowed white, and she lashed out at the male Ace Trainer. The male Ace Trainer’s tail-blade glowed dark purple, and he spun around to block her Crush Claw attack with his own Poison Tail. The two pushed against each other, with the young man’s tail-blade trapped between the young woman’s claws. However, the feral snarls on their faces quickly faded, and were replaced with looks of horror as they realised what they were doing.

Clair also spotted two other hybrids in the lobby. A Beauty had been transformed into a Geodude hybrid. The woman’s skin was now rocky and hard, and her legs had completely vanished, leaving her with only her arms. A naked female Bellossom hybrid was standing next to the Beauty. The Bellossom was covering up her new breasts with her left arm as she staggered around, adjusting to her new human proportions and causing the leaves growing out of her waist to sway with her movements. The Beauty reached up with her right hand towards her Bellossom, and the Bellossom took her trainer’s rocky hand.

“Everyone, please, try to remain calm,” a voice called out, desperately trying to be heard over the noise in the Pokémon Center. Standing behind the reception counter was a Pokémon Center Nurse. However, this nurse had been transformed into a Kangaskhan hybrid. Her uniform was in tatters, due to the fact that she had grown about a foot and a half in height, as well as due to the new muscles that had formed. Her skin was now the same colour brown as a Kangaskhan’s hide, and she had also developed the cream coloured belly of a Kangaskhan as well. Clair also noticed that a Kangaskhan’s pouch was visible through the remains of the nurse’s uniform, and that the nurse appeared to have put a Substitute doll in her pouch.

“We currently do not know what is causing these transformations, or how to prevent them,” the nurse continued. “Rest assured, we will do what we can to return you to normal once we understand the problem. Until then, please remain calm, and we will see what can be done for you in the meantime.”

Clair looked around the Pokémon Center again. A male Ace Trainer had become a Seviper hybrid, a female Ace Trainer had become a Zangoose hybrid, a Beauty had become a Geodude hybrid, and the Pokemon Center’s nurse had become a Kangaskhan hybrid. Not only that, but a Bird Keeper’s female Dodrio and the Beauty’s female Bellossom had both become human hybrids. Whatever was causing these transformations was doing so without regard for species, affecting humans and Pokémon alike, causing Clair to shudder. She looked up at her Dragonite, feeling a pang of guilt. She had no idea what was causing these transformations, but it was entirely possible her Dragonite could be affected as well.

“Dragonite?” Clair asked. Her Dragonite looked down at her.

“Are you sure you’re feeling alright?” Clair asked. “You might have been affected by... whatever it is that’s causing this.”
14532212121122.title: Clair saw several other Pokémorphs.

14532222.content: How about Drasna, Dragon-type specialist of the Kalos Elite Four?
14532222.title: Drasna

145322221.content:
Drasna sat silently on a long as she stared off into space, looking out over the breathtaking view to be seen atop Mt. Coronet. Concern had been raised around a particularly bizarre strain of flu that was spreading rapidly throughout the world, and to avoid being infected herself, the elderly Dragon-type trainer had made her way to Sinnoh, the land of her grandparents, and set up a camp on the mountainside to wait until the disease had run its course.

Nevertheless, though, the Elite Four member had been feeling ill since this morning, exhibiting the same basic symptoms that the disease shared, and she feared the worst. So she had decided to sit here in the sun, waiting patiently for the rest of the virus' prescribed effects to take place.

Sure enough, pain rapidly flared up inside of Drasna's body; she bit her lip to hold in her cry of agony, but a groan of pain still slipped free from her as she began to change. Her skin shifted in texture, wrinkles smoothing themselves out; her bones began to warp and twist, and her internal organs rearranged themselves like they were being stirred in a soup. Still, though, the master trainer weathered the pain like a champion - she wasn't known as an expert on raising Dragon-types for nothing, and her years of experience had brought her plenty of pain. And strangely enough, the pain soon began to fade away just as suddenly as it had come, but its effects were still plain as day on Drasna's body.

For the former member of the Kalos Elite Four had been transformed into an anthropomorphic...
145322221.title: Hell yes!

14532222121.content:
With a rumbling groan, Drasna rose up to her feet, a wide smile appearing on her face as she looked down at her new body. "O-oh, my." She cooed, turning to look at her reflection in a nearby pool. "This is quite the unexpected change."

She was immense, towering over the rocks and boulders all around her at nearly eleven feet tall, causing her clothes to burst into tatters and leaving her totally nude, but she had grown in more than just height. Drasna's figure was now reminiscent of some sort of ancient fertility goddess: wide hips, thighs as thick around as an Ursaring's torso, and a great meaty ass easily large enough to totally hide a grown man beneath it were she to sit on someone's lap, a large fatty belly large enough to hold two or three adults in the fetal position inside it, and the crown jewel of it all, a pair of utterly massive breasts each larger than beanbag chairs and many times softer, capped with areolae the size of dinner plates and nipples larger than a grown man's clenched fist. Her face had extended into a blunt reptilian muzzle, and a sharp-looking horn jutted forwards from her forehead. Her hair had gotten longer, cascading down her shoulders like a chestnut-brown waterfall, and her ears had grown larger and more rounded, like those of a rodent.
Dull purple-grey armored scales covered the Elite Four member's body from head to toe, while her breasts, belly, and groin were a light cream-tan in color; large blunt-tipped spires of bone, colored the same purplish grey as the rest of her body, protruded from Drasna's back, and a long, thick purple tail grew from just above her immense ass, reaching all the way down to the ground where it extended for another three meters or so.
Her arms and legs had become considerably thicker and sturdier as well, thick with equal parts armored scales, thick fat, and thicker muscle; Drasna's legs were now rather stout and solid, with just two sturdy clawed toes on each foot, and her powerful arms only sported four digits now - three fingers and a thumb, each tipped with a large, curved claw.

Drasna had become a Nidoqueen, and an utterly titanic one at that; as she flexed one massive arm, she grinned widely to herself, revealing several dozen sturdy and fairly sharp teeth.
"I feel... I feel incredible!" The older trainer laughed, giving her massive mammaries a light squeeze and cooing at their warm softness. She could see none of the wrinkles or creases that had adorned her human face, and her body felt more spry and limber than it had in decades. Drasna had been returned to the prime of her youth, and she was absolutely loving it.

"But what to do now, I wonder?" She mused to herself. Perhaps she should release her pokemon and introduce them to the new her... but there was a warmth growing in between her legs that she hadn't felt in a long, long time. Perhaps she should go out and find someone to 'satisfy' her first....
